Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe takes the wheel and drives away.'}
{3: "Liv gazes at the heat-distorted horizon in silence. Her silken hair flutters in the hot wind as her body bumps along with the vehicle's uneven movements."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're behaving a lot calmer than I expected.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Hey, Mr. Watanabe is talking to you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'm waiting for Mr. Watanabe's apology.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'What? You—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hah, made of sterner stuff than your looks entail.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'You kidnapped me. For this, you face the risk of warfare with Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This is not a risk you can afford to take. Not for an organization the size of the Forsaken.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'If you require my help, you should have asked us about it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But instead, you have separated us and put my companions in danger.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We do not wish to harm you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "But we also do not care about your safety, and will not fear the consequences of what we've done.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Babylonia owes us too much. And we have always been ready for full-frontal warfare.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But now, we need the coming event to succeed.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'For this, placing your companions in danger to slow down the Corrupted—it was all part of the plan.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'From the start, you never had a choice in the matter but to follow us...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Mr. Watanabe. Please stop the car and I'll leave here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If you do decide to aid us, then after all this is done, I can consider... apologizing to you and your companions.', 4: '2'}
